function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adoption of biomedical application ontologies","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding and sharing knowledge about pandemics and infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Promote the benefits and importance of using biomedical application ontologies in disease representation","Technologies":"Semantic Web technologies, ontology development tools","People":"Health researchers, decision makers, ontology developers","Owner":"Health organizations, ontology community"},{"Description":"Inadequate development of new ontologies","Impact":"Limitation in identifying drugs and vaccines for infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Encourage the ontology community to develop new ontologies and extend existing ones","Technologies":"Ontology development tools, semantic web technologies","People":"Health researchers, ontology developers","Owner":"Ontology community, health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited use of tools and languages for ontology development","Impact":"Hindrance in developing comprehensive ontologies for disease representation","Mitigation":"Promote the use of available tools and languages for ontology development, provide training and resources","Technologies":"Ontology development tools, programming languages, Semantic Web technologies","People":"Ontology developers, researchers","Owner":"IT departments, ontology community"}]}
